info.title: Research Portal API
info.description: API resources for the Research Portal

post.description: Used to authenticate users with LDAP campuskey/password flow

200.description: Contains the token for authorization in the payload

get.description: Returns an array of string values for all the unique departments in the db

200.description: list if unique departments for all listings in db

get.description: Returns an array of string values for all the unique divisions in the db

200.description: list if unique divisions for all listings in db

get.description: Returns an array of string values for all the unique attending physicians in the db

200.description: list of unique attending physicians for all listings in db

get.description: Returns an array of string values for all the unique divisions in the db

200.description: list of unique position types for all listings in db

get.description: Returns the version of the app as an object
